mapper.select: SELECT rr.employee_seq, rr.employee_num, d.department_name, r.employee_name AS reviewer_name, rr.employee_name AS reviewee_name, SUM(pr.peer_review_score) AS peerReviewScoreSum, SUM(pl.peer_review_list_score) AS peerReviewScoreListSum FROM employee rr JOIN department d ON rr.department_seq = d.department_seq LEFT JOIN peer_review pr ON rr.employee_seq = pr.reviewee_seq LEFT JOIN employee r ON pr.reviewer_seq = r.employee_seq LEFT JOIN peer_review_list pl ON pr.peer_review_list_seq = pl.peer_review_list_seq LEFT JOIN employee reviewee ON rr.employee_seq = reviewee.employee_seq WHERE rr.employee_seq IN ( SELECT gm.employee_seq FROM group_member gm WHERE gm.task_group_seq = #{taskGroupSeq} ) GROUP BY rr.employee_num, d.department_name, r.employee_name, rr.employee_name

SELECT l.peer_review_list_content, -- 항목 (key) CAST(r.peer_review_score AS SIGNED) AS peer_review_score -- 점수 (value) FROM peer_review r JOIN peer_review_list l ON r.peer_review_list_seq = l.peer_review_list_seq WHERE r.reviewee_seq = #{employeeSeq};
